Admin Tool Box
Manage your Farming Simulator 2022 server easily. - General - Enable/Disable sleeping - Enable/Disable AI helpers - Set max time speed - Set player running speed - Set player strengh - Store - Open/ Close store - Set Store opening/closing hours - Enable/Disable vehicle leasing in the store - Restrict store to selected farms (idea) - Farms - Set credit limit - Add/Remove money from farms - Missions - Enable/Disable missions - Enable/Disable vehicle renting for missions - Set mission rewards
